March 11, 2016

UK mobile ad spend to overtake TV this year

Mobile ad spend in the UK is expected to rise by 35% this year, overtaking TV advertising spend for the first time, according to eMarketer. The research firm predicted that mobile ad spend will grow to £4.58 billion in 2016, accounting for 27.0% of UK total media ad spend. By comparison, TV spend is tipped… Read More
